script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_room"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
# face %(unit_a)s "usual"
@
マスターは
芭蕉扇から熱烈に招かれ
部屋を訪れた…

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "smile"
@芭蕉扇
あ・な・た…♪
やっと二人きりになれたね…

# voice 5008 "bashosen_0004"
@芭蕉扇
これからなにをするか…
わかるよね…♪

# select "優しくしてね♪" "select_label_01" "寝かせないぞ" "select_label_02" "わかりません" "select_label_03"
これからなにをするか…
わかるよね…♪

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 2
# fadeout "black" 1.2
